channel.title: About on The Everyday Quantum Mechanic
channel.description: Recent content in About on The Everyday Quantum Mechanic

item.title: About Me
item.description: The following sections describe three interrelated and indivisible aspects of my life. Each component informs and enriches the others. Physics I first learned to appreciate science from my parents. My mother taught me to ask questions and to keep trying. My father likewise encouraged me and gave me a sense of wonder for the universe; we’ve spent many fond times looking at the stars together. Currently, I am a PhD candidate at the University of Alberta.
